name: Slimefriend! [PROTOTYPE]
description:
Done for Strawberry Jam 2 (and Trans Gal Jam). Have fun on your date!

NOTE: This is very very very very rough and unfinished. I didn't have a lot of time to work on games this month. Maybe at some point I'll come back to it and work on it some more but life kind of got in the way this time around.
